message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $14,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand you have a budget, but $11,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need to make sure I get a fair price.  How about $13,000?  This is still a great deal for you, and it's closer to where I need to be.

I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but $13,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $12,500. I'm really interested in this product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  I'm willing to make one last concession, but $12,500 is still a little too low.  How about we split the difference and go with $12,750?  This is a fair price for both of us, and it lets us close this deal.  What do you say?

I appreciate your willingness to split the difference, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to go up to $12,500, but no higher. I really want this product, but I need to make sure I'm not overspending. Can you meet me at $12,500?
